Most Illustrious Sir  
Piratini, December 12, 1838.

By order of the Treasury Court, as has been determined today by this Department, the orders will be issued for the Collector of Bagé to accept all drafts by Your Excellency Fazenda da Música, and all amounts not yet auctioned and included in the provisions of the Decrees of November 11, 1836, and April 1837: which I communicate to you for your information and in response to your official letter of the 3rd of this month.

God preserve Your Excellency  
Secretary of the Treasury in Piratini, December 12, 1838.  
Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.  
Domingos José de Almeida
